overview: Tina (Kirsten Price) has it all, beauty, brains, a successful career and her pick of lovers. Too busy climbing the corporate ladder, she relies on one night stands to satisfy her sexual urges. But things change when she has a chance encounter with a mysterious stranger.Puzzling notes, emails and gifts intrigue Tina and she soon finds herself being lead on a maze of bizarre sexual encounters by her unknown lover. A relentless game of cat mouse ensues and Tina soon understands what it means to be fulfilled.
title: The Stranger
